text:
RELIGION

Arulmigu Anjaneya Swamy Temple, Kallukuzhi : Sri Hanuman Jayanthi, special abishekam, aradhanai,5.30 a.m.; 1,00,008 vada and 1,00,008 jangiri malai sattruthal, 7 a.m.; eka dina laksharchanai, 9 a.m.; thiruveedhi ula, 9 p.m.

Sri Sanjeeevana Anjaneyar Trust, Srirangam : Sri Hanuman Jayanthi, pal kudam procession, South Chithrai Street, Srirangam, 6 a.m.; 108 kalasa pooja, thirumanjanam, 7 a.m.; jangiri/vadai malai sattruthal, Raja alangaram, 2 p.m.; discourse by N.Vijayasundari, 7 p.m.

Organising Committee : Sri Radha Madhava vivaha vaibhavam, thodayamangalam, ashtapathi, Ramji Mahal, Woraiyur, 1 p.m.; Divya nama sangeerthanam, dolothsavam, 9 p.m.

Chinmaya Mission: Sri Hanuman Jayanthi, Ganapathy homam, Chinmaya Vidyalaya campus, Srirangam, 6 a.m.; Hanuman Chalisa homam, 8 a.m.; special abishekam and alangaram, 11.30 a.m.

Sri Andavan Ashram, Srirangam : Discourse on Thirupaavai by Sri Aravamudachariar, Sri Vedanta Desikan Sannidhi, North Chithra Street, Srirangam, 7 a.m.

Sri Ramanuja Siddandha Sabha : Discourse on Thirupaavai by Andal Rajan, Sri Kamalavalli Nachiar Temple, Woraiyur, 6.45 p.m.

Sri Bashyakarar Kainkarya Sabha and Thirumala Thirupathi Devasthanam : Discourse on Thirupaavai by Sri Rama Badrachariar, Sri Venkatachalapathi Temple, BHEL Township, 6.30 p.m.

Sri Ananthakrishna Varatharaja Perumal Temple, Angarai : Dhanur masa bhajans, 5.30 a.m.

Sri Vishnu Sahasranama Parayana Sabha : Sri Vishnu Sahasranama parayanam, Veera Sanjeevi Anjaneyar Sannidhi, West Gate, Srirangam, 6 p.m.

Sri Rama Nama Sath Sangam: Sri Hanumath Jayanthi mahotsavam, thirumanjanam, Sri Ashta Siddhi Vinayagar Temple, Ayyappa Nagar, 4 p.m.; Sahasranama archanai,5.30 p.m.; veedhi ula, 6.30 p.m.

CULTURE

Rasavelar Shenbaga Tamil Arangu : Special address by A.Gopinath,102, Gandhi Salai, Srirangam, 6 p.m.

GENERAL

Bharathidasan University : Inauguration of Career and Counselling Cell and job fair, V.M.Muthukumar, Vice Chancellor, inaugurates, P.Manoharan, Additional General Manager (Logistics), BHEL, Tiruchi, speaks, Khajamalai campus, 10.30 a.m.; Department of Commerce and Financial Studies and SMART Journal of Business Management Studies: Seminar on Financial Markets – issues and challenges, release of SMART journal and presentation of SMART Journal Awards, C.Thiruchelvam, Registrar, inaugurates, university campus, 9.30 a.m.

St.Joseph’s College : Graduation Day of arts and commerce graduates, K.Sekar, Director of Collegiate Education, delivers the graduation day address, 10 a.m.; Graduation day of science graduates, S.Manian, Vice Chancellor, Annamalai University, delivers the graduation day address, 3 p.m.; Seminar on social concerns in Indian Literature translated into English, P.Sivakami, writer and social activist, speaks, 9.30 a.m.

Tiruchi Engineering College, Surya Engineering College and Lions Club of Srirangam : ‘Ninaivu nijamagum,’- career guidance programme for Plus Two students, Tiruchi Engineering College campus, Konalai, 9 a.m.

Confederation of Real Estate Developers Associations of India : Fairpro 2016 – property show, Hotel Sangam, 10 a.m. to 8 p.m.

Holy Cross College Department of Chemistry: Chem Expo, 9 a.m.

Anti-Corruption Movement : Awareness programme, K.M.Subramanian, presides, Hotel Raja Gardens, 5 p.m.

M.A.M. College of Engineering and Technology and Chidambaram Pillai College for Women: Rural development programme on entrepreneurship and employability skills, A.Loganathan, presides, Chidambaram Pillai College for Women campus, Manachanallur, 9.30 a.m.

Shrimathi Indira Gandhi College : Programme on Tamil tradition and medicinal properties of turmeric, 2 p.m.

Jamal Mohamed College : Lecture on Sweeping through interviews by B.Balamurugan, assistant professor, H.H.The Rajah’s College, 11 a.m.

Thillai Nagar Sakthi Sangam: Sakthi Dina vizha, R.P.Rajeswari, vice principal, MIET Arts and Science College, chief guest, Hotel Mayas, 5.30 p.m.

M.A.M.College of Engineering : Faculty development programme on pre fabricated structures, 9.30 a.m.

Bishop Heber College and We Trust : Awareness programme on mushroom cultivation, Mariamman Temple, Mudukupatti, 4 p.m.

SRV Matriculation Higher Secondary School, Samayapuram : Vistas – 10{+t}{+h}annual day, R.Balakrishnan, Additional Chief Secretary, Odisha, and Sivakumar, actor, speak, 9 a.m.

District Administration : Distribution of monsoon sustenance assistance to potters, T.P.Poonachi, Minister for Khadi and Village Industries, chief guest, Collector’s Office, 10.15 a.m.; opening of new bus shelter, near Government Hospital, 10.30 a.m.; inauguration of special camp for changes in ration cards, R.C.Higher Secondary School, 10.45 a.m.

All India BSNL Officers Association : District conference and seminar on BSNL on Revival Path, V.Raju, Principal General Manager, BSNL, Tiruchi, and M.S.Radha Krishnan, Circle Secretary, AIBSNLOA, speak, office of the Principal General Manager, 10 a.m.

Jamal Mohamed College Department of Information Technology : Inter-collegiate technical symposium, A.Vadivel, Head, Department of Computer Applications, National Institute of Technology, inaugurates, 9.30 a.m.

Department of Information and Public Relations : Government exhibition, St.John’s Vestry Anglo Indian Higher Secondary School grounds,

4 p.m.
title: TIRUCHI today
